fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are given 4 roles of a random faction not in play, you have all their abilities and passives.
- You may multitask one ability from each role you were given, or use their factional mechanics.
- You use the attack level of the role the ability comes from.
- Your defense level is the highest of all roles.
- (x4) stands for: if you are killed in any way, you lose a life but you will survive, once you lose all lives, you die, you may lose multiple lives in the same night if killed multiple times.
- If you lose a life you will also lose the abilities and passives of a random role you have.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who doesn't win with your faction.
